titleStmt.title: The nonsuch professor in his Meridian splendor, or the singular actions of sanctified Christians. Laid open in seaven sermons at Allhallows church in the wall, London. / By William Secker preacher of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Secker, William, d. 1681?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Thomas Parkhurst, to be sold at his shpo at the three crowns, over against the great conduit in Cheapside.,

notesStmt.note: With a six page publisher's advertisement at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
